page.title: 03SCHOOLS
page.content: THERE ARE SEVERAL SCHOOLS IN OUR AREA WHICH PROVIDE EDUCATION FROM THE INFANTS AT THE AGE OF FOUR YEARS TO THOSE READY TO GO TO UNIVERSITY AT EIGHTEEN. THERE ARE 8 PRIMARY SCHOOLS AND FROM THESE CHILDREN GO TO ONE OF THE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS. THERE ARE 2 OF THESE IN OUR AREA BUT MANY CHILDREN COME FROM OTHER PARTS OF THE TOWN TO THE SCHOOLS.AFTER FIVE YEARS AT ONE OF THESE SCHOOLS YOU CAN GO TO THE SIXTH FORM COLLEGE FOR TWO YEARS TO GET QUALIFICATIONS FOR UNIVERSITY ENTRANCE. OTHERWISE YOU CAN GO TO A COLLEGE OF FURTHER EDUCATION WHICH HAS COURSES FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE PRACTICAL MINDED.
